comment: No matter who you have for INED 3300 you will have the same assignments. However, do not take it with Dr. Sitten. She will respond to your emails late without answering the questions, won't give mandatory feedback on assignments, and will give everyone the same grade for everything.
Please avoid this professor at all costs. She is very petty and deducts points for miniscule things. When you reach out to her, she can care less. Thank me later!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: This professor does not care about the success of her students. She never responds to emails and is quick to say "read syllabus". She is in the wrong profession.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Mandy Sitten is not a bad professor as much as she teaches a weirdly formatted course. The course content was created by the head of the program, so the teachers only have to grade your assignments. The teacher provides a rubric with every single assignment so make sure you follow that rubric and hit every point. The rubric is the key is passing!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--So many papers

comment: Responded to emails 2-5 days later THAT HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH WHAT I ASKED. Content is written by the department head, instructors for this course only grade the material you submit. She was always 4-6 weeks behind on grading  I had no feedback on a progressive project from mod 1- 13. Oh and if you don't get a B you don't pass. Pick someone else
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--So many papers
